original_text: And Peter had followed him at a distance, right into the courtyard of the high priest. And he was sitting with the guards and warming himself at the fire.
korean_text: 베드로가 예수를 멀찍이 따라 대제사장의 집 뜰 안까지 들어가서 아랫사람들과 함께 앉아 불을 쬐더라

sentences.original_text: And Peter had followed him at a distance
right into the courtyard of the high priest
And he was sitting with the guards
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 경비병들과 함께 앉아 있었고

sentences.original_text: and warming himself at the fire
